meanings.definition: A person who has completed a doctoral degree and is engaged in further research or training in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: Many postdocs conduct experiments in laboratories.
meanings.sent2: Universities often hire postdocs to assist with research projects.
meanings.sent3: The postdocs at the science lab accidentally mixed up their samples.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, postdocs are like detectives uncovering new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The group of postdocs eagerly discussed their latest findings.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which a person works as a postdoctoral researcher.
meanings.sent1: During their postdocs, researchers focus on publishing their work.
meanings.sent2: Postdocs usually last for a few years after completing a PhD.
meanings.sent3: The postdocs celebrated the end of their research period with a party.
meanings.sent4: The postdocs' journey is like a marathon of learning and discovery.
meanings.sent5: The postdocs diligently documented their progress in their research journals.
